chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Set
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)

Goal:
forall a b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> forall nZa : ~ eqA a A0, ~ eqA (divA b a nZa) A0

Premises:
zero_mon : forall d : nat, mon d
Inductive mon : nat -> Set := n_0 : mon 0 | c_n : forall d : nat, nat -> mon d -> mon (S d) Arguments mon _%nat_scope Arguments c_n (_ _)%nat_scope
mult_mon : forall d : nat, mon d -> mon d -> mon d
CoefStructure : forall (A : Set) (A0 : A), A -> forall eqA : A -> A -> Prop, (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A) -> Prop
OrderStructure : forall A : Set, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> (A -> A -> A) -> Prop
pair : ?A -> ?B -> ?A * ?B where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n ->...-> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) |- Type]
divpf_canonical : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> canonical A0 eqA ltM (divpf A A0 eqA plusA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a nZa p)
canonical_Dmult : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> canonical A0 eqA ltM (Dmult A A0 eqA plusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a nZa p q)
Rminus_is_mult : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> eqP A eqA n (Rminus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a nZa p q r) (minuspf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec p (Dmult A A0 eqA plusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a nZa r q))
canonical_Rminus : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> canonical A0 eqA ltM (Rminus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a nZa p q r)
canonical_spminusf : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> canonical A0 eqA ltM (spminusf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a b nZb p q)
mults_dist2 : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> eqP A eqA n (pO A n) (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec (mults multA (n:=n) a p) (mults multA (n:=n) b p))
reduceplus_cb1_lem : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> CombLinear A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec (x :: Q) b
canonical_spminusf_full_t : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (spminusf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a b nZb p q))
sminus : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop), (forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}) -> OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) -> poly A0 eqA ltM -> poly A0 eqA ltM -> poly A0 eqA ltM
mults_dist1 : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> eqP A eqA n (mults multA (n:=n) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a b) p) (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec (mults multA (n:=n) a p) (mults multA (n:=n) b p))
nil : list ?A where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) |- Type]
spolyf_pO : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> forall (a : list (Term A n)) (Ca : canonical A0 eqA ltM a), eqP A eqA n (spolyf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a a Ca Ca) (pO A n)
divp_is_multTerm : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> eqP A eqA n (mults multA (n:=n) (divTerm (A0:=A0) (eqA:=eqA) divA (n:=n) a (b:=b) nZb) p) (divpf A A0 eqA plusA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec b nZb (mults multA (n:=n) a p))
mults_minusTerm : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> eqP A eqA n (mults multA (n:=n) (minusTerm minusA (n:=n) a b) p) (minuspf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec (mults multA (n:=n) a p) (mults multA (n:=n) b p))
eqptail_spminusf_com : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> eqP A eqA n (spminusf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a b nZb p r) (spminusf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a b nZb q r)
CombLinear_mults1 : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> CombLinear A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q (mults multA (n:=n) a p)
minuspf_refl : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> forall p : list (Term A n), eqP A eqA n (minuspf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec p p) (pO A n)
mults_comp_minuspf : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> eqP A eqA n (minuspf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec (mults multA (n:=n) a p) (mults multA (n:=n) a q)) (mults multA (n:=n) a (minuspf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec p q))
minuspf_refl_eq : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> forall p : list (Term A n), minuspf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec p p = pO A n
eqTerm_spminusf_com : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> eqP A eqA n (spminusf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a c nZc p q) (spminusf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec b c nZc p q)
spminusf_extend : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> eqP A eqA n (spminusf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a b nZb p q) (spminusf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a b nZb (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q))

canonical_minuspf : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> canonical A0 eqA ltM (minuspf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec l1 l2)
minuspf_pO_refl : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> forall p : list (Term A n), eqP A eqA n (minuspf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec p (pO A n)) p
reduce_mults_invf : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> reduce A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p (mults multA (n:=n) (divTerm (A0:=A0) (eqA:=eqA) divA (n:=n) (T1 A1 n) (b:=a) nZa) q)

cons : ?A -> list ?A -> list ?A where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) |- Type]
multpf_smultm_assoc : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> eqP A eqA n (mults multA (n:=n) a (multpf A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec p q)) (multpf A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec (mults multA (n:=n) a p) q)
